page.title: 14WOMENS INSTITUTES IN PENNARD
page.content: THERE ARE THREE BRANCHES OF THE WOMENS INSTITUTE IN THE AREA,PARKMILL,PENMAEN AND PENNARD. PARKMILL HAS 46 MEMBERS, HOLDING ITS MONTHLY MEETING IN THE COMMUNITY HALL, PENMAEN HAS 22 MEMBERS AND MEET MONTHLY IN PENMAEN PARISH HALL. PENNARD MONTHLY MEETINGS ARE HELD IN PENNARD PARISH HALL, BUT SINCE 63 OF ITS 89 MEMBERS LIVE IN THE AREA, IT MUST BE INCLUDED. THE MOVEMENT PROVIDES COMPANIONSHIP AND FUN FOR MEMBERS, WHILE CATERING FOR A WIDE RANGE OF INTERESTS, PENNARD CHOIR PARTICIPATES AT LOCAL, COUNTY AND NATIONAL LEVELS, WHILE THE DRAMA SECTION SUPPLIES ENTERTAINMENT IN DRAMA, DANCE, MIME AND REVUE FOR THEMSELVES AND THE COMMUNITY. TRADITIONAL SKILLS ARE EMPLOYED IN CATERING FOR THE ANNUAL VILLAGE CARNIVAL, THE GOWER SHOW, AND INTERNAL FUNCTIONS.
